SELECT md_info.barcode_no, md_img, type, detail_type, company, md_name, member_t.order_ea , member_t.approval_ea, cost, price, shelf_life, md_img FROM md_info left join order_board on md_info.barcode_no = order_board.barcode_no left join md_price on md_info.barcode_no = md_price.barcode_no left join (select barcode_no, order_ea, approval_ea from order_board where member_no = #{member_no}) as member_t on md_info.barcode_no = member_t.barcode_no where type = #{type} and detail_type like concat('%',#{detail_type},'%') and md_name like concat('%',#{md_name},'%') group by md_info.barcode_no, md_img, type, detail_type, company, md_name, member_t.order_ea, member_t.approval_ea, cost, price, shelf_life, md_img order by md_name asc
SELECT detail_type FROM md_info where type = #{type} group by detail_type

choose.when: UPDATE order_board SET order_ea = #{order_ea} where member_no=#{member_no} and barcode_no=#{barcode_no};
